summary: A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.
cast: Vin Diesel|Radha Mitchell|Cole Hauser|Keith David|Lewis Fitz-Gerald|Claudia Black|Rhiana Griffith|John Moore|Simon Burke|Les Chantery|Sam Sari|Firass Dirani|Ric Anderson|Vic Wilson|Angela Moore|Peter Chiang|Ken Twohy
title: Pitch Black
